CustomField.description: 5. Registration Type cannot be more than 50 characters.  for the registration page a. Needs to include General Sessions? i. “PFG” -> if PFG Invitee = Investor or Prospect and BIM does not = Investor or prospect ii. “BIM” -> if BIM Invitee = Investor or Prospect and PFG does not = Investor or prospect iii. PFG; Fund meetings (list specific funds) i.e. “PFG; BREF III; BSREP II” -> if PFG Invitee = Investor or Prospect and BIM does not = Investor or prospect iv. BIM; PFG; Fund meetings (list specific funds) “BIM; PFG; BREF III; BSREP II” v. “BIM; PFG; All meetings” (no need to list funds, all will show if the number of characters of Fund meetings is longer than 40) vi. “PFG; All meetings” (no need to list funds, all will show if the number of characters of Fund meetings is longer than 40)
CustomField.label: Registration Type - CVENT
